County Clare is looking fun today with 4 ft @ 8s WNW swell and fresh 15 mph NW wind. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are your top picks, both holding shape nicely. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s with light 5 mph S winds, making for clean conditions at spots like Cregg Beach and Doughmore. Day after, expect a bump to 6 ft @ 9s with moderate 12 mph WNW winds, keeping it lively at Crab Island and Lahinch Beach. Best: tomorrow.
